Description.Text:
Club Quarters is a full service hotel in the center of downtown Houston. This beautiful restored landmark building is near all the major office buildings. Convenient to Bayou Place for trendy restaurants and nightlife and Main Street, a plaza with many eateries, bars and nightclubs. Easy access to downtown's transportation system: light rail, free trolleys and air conditioned underground tunnels. Short walk to the citys renowned theater district, the Houston Downtown Aquarium, and the George R. Brown Convention Center. Walking distance to two major league sports venues: Minute Maid Park home to the Houston Astros, and Toyota Center, home to the NBA Houston Rockets, the WNBA Comets and the AHL Aeros. Ideal for both business and leisure travelers with 24 hour concierge services and fitness facility. Valet parking available onsite for $19.95/night. Table 7 Bistro features New Age American Urban cuisine.
Other amenities include free high-speed Internet access, free chilled bottled water, and comfortable beds with luxury linens. Private Club Room with complimentary newspapers, magazines, coffee and tea. Rooms are comfortable, elegantly styled and beautifully appointed, with all modern conveniences.

From George Bush Intercontinental Airport Houston/IAH (I-45North) Take I-45 South to the McKinney Street Exit. Follow McKinney about 4 blocks and turn left on Travis Street. Go 2 blocks and turn right onto Rusk. The hotel is 2 blocks on the left. From William P. Hobby Airport (I-45 South): Take I-45 North to the downtown/Scott Street split. Exit onto Pease Street. Follow Pease to Travis Street and turn right. Follow Travis about 9 blocks and turn right onto Rusk. The hotel is 2 blocks on the left. From Austin on the 290: Take 290 South to 610 South to I-10 East From I-10 east, exit onto Smith Street toward downtown. Follow Smith Street about 5 blocks and turn left onto Rusk Street. The Hotel is 5 blocks on the left.

Superior with Kitchenette - Oversized room with one queen bed and kitchenette, including microwave and refrigerator. Other features include premium mattress and luxury linens, contemporary wood furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, cable TV with On Demand movies, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, clock radio alarm clock, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms may accommodate a rollaway - available only upon request and subject to availability. Maximum Occupancy: 3
Standard Room - One queen bed with premium mattress and luxury linens. Other features include contemporary wood furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, cable TV with On Demand movies, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, clock radio alarm clock, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Maximum Occupancy: 2
1 Room Suite with Kitchenette - One queen bed with kitchenette, including microwave and refrigerator. Other features include premium mattress and luxury linens, contemporary wood furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, cable TV with On Demand movies, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, clock radio alarm clock, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Some rooms may accommodate a chairbed or rollaway -available only upon request and subject to availability. Maximum Occupancy: 3
Single/Small Double Room - One full or queen bed with premium mattress and luxury linens. Other features include contemporary wood furnishings - latest design workstation with task lighting, ergonomic chair and complimentary high-speed Internet access with network printing, cable TV with On Demand movies, 2-line speaker and cordless phones with direct dial number and voicemail, clock radio alarm clock, individual climate control, hair dryer, makeup/shaving mirror and tea/coffee making facilities. Maximum Occupancy: 2
2-Bedroom Apartment - 2 Bedroom/2 bath apartment with separate living area featuring sleeper sofa and dining table for 4. Kitchen features full-size refrigerator, dishwasher, two-eye cook-top, microwave/convection oven and complete house ware package includes weekly housekeeping service and local calls
